name: Saybrook
description:
Saybrook, Connecticut – 1648

You are Elinor Peyton, maidservant to the Harris household.

You must guide her through a period of mass hysteria, as a witch hunt consumes the town.

A visual novel about the Connecticut witch trials. Made for the Historically Accurate Game Jam 5

---

Original theme by Dillan Hoyos 

Additional sound design by Dillan Hoyos

Additional concept design by Kate Gottfredson

Made by Jeff and Dom

jeffanddom.com
